speaker: ROMEO
text:
Can
               
              I
               
              go
               
              forward
               
              when
               
              my
               
              heart
               
              is
               
              here
              ?

speaker: ROMEO
text:
Turn
               
              back
              ,
               
              dull
               
              earth
              ,
               
              and
               
              find
               
              thy
               
              center
               
              out
              .

speaker: BENVOLIO
text:
Romeo
              ,
               
              my
               
              cousin
               
              Romeo
              ,
               
              Romeo
              !

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
He
               
              is
               
              wise

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
And
              ,
               
              on
               
              my
               
              life
              ,
               
              hath
               
              stol’n
               
              him
               
              home
               
              to
               
              bed
              .

speaker: BENVOLIO
text:
He
               
              ran
               
              this
               
              way
               
              and
               
              leapt
               
              this
               
              orchard
               
              wall
              .

speaker: BENVOLIO
text:
Call
              ,
               
              good
               
              Mercutio
              .

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              conjure
               
              too
              .

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Romeo
              !
               
              Humors
              !
               
              Madman
              !

              !

              !

text:
Appear
               
              thou
               
              in
               
              the

              of
               
              a
               
              sigh
              .

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Speak
               
              but
               
              one
               
              rhyme
               
              and
               
              I
               
              am

              .

text:
Cry
               
              but
               
              “

              me
              ,
              ”

              but
               
              “
              love
              ”
               
              and
               
              “
              dove
              .
              ”

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Speak
               
              to
               
              my
               
              gossip
               
              Venus
               
              one
               
              fair
               
              word
              ,

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
One
               
              nickname
               
              for
               
              her
               
              purblind
               
              son
               
              and
               
              heir
              ,

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Young
               
              Abraham
               
              Cupid
              ,
               
              he
               
              that
               
              shot
               
              so
               
              trim

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
When
               
              King
               
              Cophetua
               
              loved
               
              the
               
              beggar
               
              maid
              .
              —

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
He
               
              heareth
               
              not
              ,
               
              he
               
              stirreth
               
              not
              ,
               
              he
               
              moveth
               
              not
              .

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
The
               
              ape
               
              is
               
              dead
              ,
               
              and
               
              I
               
              must
               
              conjure
               
              him
              .
              —

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
I
               
              conjure
               
              thee
               
              by
               
              Rosaline’s
               
              bright
               
              eyes
              ,

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
By
               
              her
               
              high
               
              forehead
              ,
               
              and
               
              her
               
              scarlet
               
              lip
              ,

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
By
               
              her
               
              fine
               
              foot
              ,
               
              straight
               
              leg
              ,
               
              and
               
              quivering
               
              thigh
              ,

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
And
               
              the
               
              demesnes
               
              that
               
              there
               
              adjacent
               
              lie
              ,

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
That
               
              in
               
              thy
               
              likeness
               
              thou
               
              appear
               
              to
               
              us
              .

speaker: BENVOLIO
text:
An
               
              if
               
              he
               
              hear
               
              thee
              ,
               
              thou
               
              wilt
               
              anger
               
              him
              .

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
This
               
              cannot
               
              anger
               
              him
              .
               
              ’Twould
               
              anger
               
              him

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
To
               
              raise
               
              a
               
              spirit
               
              in
               
              his

              circle

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Of
               
              some
               
              strange
               
              nature
              ,

              it
               
              there
               
              stand

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Till
               
              she

              and

              it
               
              down

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
That

              some

              .

text:
Is

              .
               
              In
               
              his

              name
              ,

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
I
               
              conjure
               
              only
               
              but
               
              to

              up
               
              him
              .

speaker: BENVOLIO
text:
Come
              ,
               
              he
               
              hath
               
              hid
               
              himself
               
              among
               
              these
               
              trees

speaker: BENVOLIO
text:
To
               
              be
               
              consorted
               
              with
               
              the
               
              humorous
               
              night
              .

speaker: BENVOLIO
text:
Blind
               
              is
               
              his
               
              love
               
              and
               
              best
               
              befits
               
              the

              .

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
If
               
              love
               
              be
               
              blind
              ,
               
              love
               
              cannot
               
              hit
               
              the
               
              mark
              .

text:
Now
               
              will
               
              he

              under
               
              a

              tree

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
And

              of
               
              fruit

text:
As

speaker: MERCUTIO

O

              that

              were

An
               
              open-arse
              ,

              a

              .

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
Romeo
              ,
               
              good
               
              night
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              to
               
              my
               
              truckle
               
              bed
              ;

speaker: MERCUTIO
text:
This

              to

text:

Go
              ,

              vain

To

              here
